actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the levels of loans, purchases, and payments applicable to the 1982 through 1985 crops of feed grains and wheat.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended by the Agriculture Act of 1981, to increase loan and established price levels for the 1982 through 1985 corn and wheat crops.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the levels of loans, purchases, and payments applicable to the 1982 through 1985 crops of feed grains and wheat.
